  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3646</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3646</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Galí: Aprofundiment: Quantificadors i indefinits</string>
            <string language="en">Galí: Consolidation. Quantifiers and indefinite determiners</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galí: Verdichtung. Quantifizierer und
unbestimmte determiners</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Galí : Fusion. Quantifiers et 
determiners indéfinis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Galí: Consolidação. Quantifiers e 
determiners indefinidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Galí: Consolidamento. Quantifiers e 
determiners indefiniti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Galν: Σταθεροποίηση. Quantifiers και
αόριστα determiners</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Activitats interactives, adreçades a l'alumnat nouvingut, que aprofundeixen en els adjectius i els complements quantificadors i indefinits. Les activitats promouen la comprensió i l'expressió escrites.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive activities aimed at pupils who have recently moved to Catalonia. Consolidation of the use of adjectives and their quantifiers and indefinite determiners. The activities promote oral and written comprehension and expression.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">morfologia</string>
            <string language="en">morphology (linguistics)</string>
            <string language="es">morfología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió del text</string>
            <string language="en">text comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión del texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió escrita</string>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive Aktivitäten strebten Schüler an, die
vor kurzem nach Katalonien umgezogen sind. Verdichtung des 
Gebrauches der Adjektive und ihrer Quantifizierer- und unbestimmten 
determiners. Die Aktivitäten fördern Mund- und schriftliches 
Erfassen und Ausdruck.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les activités interactives ont visé les élèves
qui se sont récemment déplacés en Catalogne. Fusion de 
l'utilisation des adjectifs et de leurs determiners de quantifiers et 
indéfinis. Les activités favorisent la compréhension et 
l'expression orales et écrites.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As atividades interativas visaram os alunos que se
têm movido recentemente para Catalonia. Consolidação do uso 
dos adjetivos e de seus determiners do quantifiers e os indefinidos. 
As atividades promovem a compreensão e a expressão orais e 
escritas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le attività interattive hanno puntato sugli 
allievi che recentemente si sono mossi in Catalogna. 
Consolidamento dell'uso degli aggettivi e dei loro determiners 
indefiniti e di quantifiers. Le attività promuovono la 
comprensione e l'espressione orali e scritte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικές δραστηριότητες που στοχεύουν στους μαθητές 
που έχουν κινηθεί πρόσφατα προς την Καταλωνία. 
Σταθεροποίηση της χρήσης των επιθέτων και αόριστων 
determiners τους των quantifiers και. Οι δραστηριότητες 
προωθούν την προφορικές και γραπτές κατανόηση και την έκφραση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Morphologie (Linguistik)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Textverständnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">morphologie (linguistique)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension des textes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">morfologia (lingüistica)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão de texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">morfologia (linguistica)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione del testo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μορφολογία (γλωσσολογία)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση κειμένων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
